name: Cozy&Classy&Central
summary: Do you want to feel like a real local? Enjoy Barcelona from a flat full of style, design and with the taste of the royal estates of the Barcelona of the early 1900s. Modernity and the past come together in a careful and welcoming decor. Let yourself be surprised by its high Catalan return ceilings, its surprising details, the original wooden carpentry and the two sunny balconies where you can have the first coffee of the day. We have completely renovated this space in March 2019.
description: Do you want to feel like a real local? Enjoy Barcelona from a flat full of style, design and with the taste of the royal estates of the Barcelona of the early 1900s. Modernity and the past come together in a careful and welcoming decor. Let yourself be surprised by its high Catalan return ceilings, its surprising details, the original wooden carpentry and the two sunny balconies where you can have the first coffee of the day. We have completely renovated this space in March 2019. Be the first in this space completely renovated. The "soul" of the flat is the central space where the open kitchen is and a bar and from where you can access the outdoor living room with natural light and the two large double bedrooms. The first room is exterior to the street, with a balcony that provides natural light and pleasant view of a wide street. name: Spacious,bright & cozy. ¡Enjoy BCN!
summary: La habitación es amplia, comoda y acogedora. Dispone de balcón y mucha luz natural, que les hará sentir un ambiente cálido y tranquilo para que puedan disfrutar de la bella ciudad. Disfrutarán del mar y la  montaña. Durante su estadía intentaremos que su experiencia con nosotros sea lo más familiar posible, y así puedan tener una estancia perfecta. Disponemos de una cama adicional para una tercera persona. SÓLO PIDO RESPETAR EL HORARIO DE SALIDA DEBIDO AL ESCASO TIEMPO, POR MI ACTIVIDAD LABORAL.

name: Habitación privada-Casa con encanto dentro y fuera
summary: Una casa antigua y bonita, con mucho carácter e historia en ella. Con espacios grandes y amplios para disfrutar y relajarse tanto dentro como fuera de la casa, ya que la casa está rodeada por un patio trasero muy amplio y soleado y una terraza de piedra muy acogedora donde poder disfrutar de un buen desayuno. Eso le da mucha tranquilidad y privacidad a la casa. Además de un comedor, un salón y un despacho amplios donde poder trabajar en paz. También dispone de cuarto de baño y cocina grande.

name: Double charming room in Gothic area
summary: This charming room is located in a ground floor duplex in the historic center of the city, in a pedestrian and quiet street, two steps from the Port and the famous Ramblas. The apartment has stone walls and medieval arches, modernist tiles, wooden beams. It has all the amenities to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Ideal for travelers, families or friends.
description: This charming room is located in a ground floor duplex in the historic center of the city, in a pedestrian and quiet street, two steps from the Port and the famous Ramblas. The apartment has stone walls and medieval arches, modernist tiles, wooden beams. It has all the amenities to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Ideal for travelers, families or friends. Warm athmosphere surrounded by medieval walls and arches. Carefully refurbished conserving the originals materials. Duplex apartment:  -Ground floor: entrance hall, kitchen, one bathroom with shower, one separated toilet, dining and living room with two sofas, TV (local channels). -First floor: 11 steps staircase, two doble bedrooms, bathroom with bathtub. kitchen, living room, dining room, toilet and bathrooms. name: Habitación cerca de playa en Gótico
summary: Es una habitacion grande con cama individual (puedo poner un colchón sobre el suelo de bambú para otra persona) , balcon a una pequeña plaza y zona de estudio, el baño es pequeñito y se comparte con una habitación individual.
description: Es una habitacion grande con cama individual (puedo poner un colchón sobre el suelo de bambú para otra persona) , balcon a una pequeña plaza y zona de estudio, el baño es pequeñito y se comparte con una habitación individual. En un edificio catalogado de patrimonio historico, en la mejor calle del barrio Gotico, sobre la muralla romana, junto al puerto y muy cerca de la playa. Es la zona mejor comunicada de la ciudad : metro a 1 min.( Jaime I), a 5min (Liceo) y muchos autobuses Calle señorial y muy tranquila con dos pequeñas plazas donde tomar cafe, hace solo unos meses se inaguro un palacio restaurado como hotel 5 estrellas (Hotel Mercerino).El piso tiene una pequeña terraza dando a una plaza.Una de las habitaciones conserva frescos originales de 170 años de antiguedad, y en todo el piso se ha intentado conservar al maximo los suelos hidraulicos y la carpinyeria de madera., A menos de 5 minutos a pie de muchos museos como el de historia o el museo picaso,a pocos metros del ayuntamient

name: Big Bedroom with two separate beds
summary: Hey! Me and my flatmate, Ange are renting the bedroom in the while that we find someone for long term! We are nice and friendly girls living in Barcelona, both studying and working here. We’ll open our doors to meet new people and share our home. Since the flat is located in a residential area, we kindly ask you to be respectful with the neighbors. We live in an amazing apartment located in Barcelona’s center, it has everything near: supermarkets, shopping, restaurants, metro/bus stations.

We live in an amazing apartment located in Barcelona’s center, it has everything near: supermarkets, shopping, restaurants, metro/bus stations. It’s a three bedroom apartment, you will have your own bedroom it has two separate beds, two night tables, a closet and mirror, and we are going to share the common areas: the living room, the kitchen and the bathroom. name: Cozy & charming Duplex Sagrada Familia area
summary: Great location, walking distance from La Sagrada Familia, with metro and bus lines literally in front of our door. Our duplex is located in a beautiful tiny passage, is not a big house but it offers a comfy accommodation. You will feel in a different place and at the same time in the heart of Barcelona! We are a family of artists, sport and nature lovers who travel the world. We love to meet new people on the road. Hosting travelers is something we enjoy a lot!
description: Great location, walking distance from La Sagrada Familia, with metro and bus lines literally in front of our door. Our duplex is located in a beautiful tiny passage, is not a big house but it offers a comfy accommodation. You will feel in a different place and at the same time in the heart of Barcelona! We are a family of artists, sport and nature lovers who travel the world. We love to meet new people on the road. Hosting travelers is something we enjoy a lot! Our house is a duplex apartment located in a small passage close to La Sagrada Familia and Hospital de Sant Pau. There are restaurants, bars, supermarkets and all kind of stores around the corner. Many lines of metro and bus are in the same block. There is no elevator or neighbors in the same building so you don't have to worry about that. name: Happy room

name: Xd
summary: Habitación invidividual ideal para viajeros solitarios ubicada en zona muy céntrica de Barcelona. Piso muy luminoso, es un cuarto con ascensor, ambiente tranquilo y sin ruido.  Desde casa se puede ir andando a paseo de Gracia (10 minutos) y Plaza Catalunya (20 minutos), Sagrada Familia, Casa Batlló, Casa Milà, Parc Güell...  En el barrio es practicamente peatonal, preferencia para peatones, con poco tráfico, además hay varios restaurantes, cines... hay otra habitación que es donde vivo yo.

name: Big Apartment in Barcelona
summary: If you are traveling to Barcelona with the whole family or a large group of friends, this apartment is ideal for you. It's clean, spacious and cozy. Located next to the Sants market, near the Fira de Barcelona and the Camp Nou. A few minutes by public transport from the most emblematic places of Barcelona.
description: If you are traveling to Barcelona with the whole family or a large group of friends, this apartment is ideal for you. It's clean, spacious and cozy. Located next to the Sants market, near the Fira de Barcelona and the Camp Nou. A few minutes by public transport from the most emblematic places of Barcelona. This apartment has three comfortable bedrooms, all with double beds (that can become two individual beds). Two spacious and full bathrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped. The spacious living room has both sitting and dining areas. We rent the entire apartment. We are available for any questions or problems you may have. We will give you our phone number so you can call us. Feel free to contact us! Sants is a historical neighborhood with a lot of identity, considered the best communicated in Barcelona. name: Sunny penthouse with Barcelona views for 4!
summary: This is a cozy studio, with two double beds, kitchen, bathroom and a big terrace with great views. There is air conditioning for the hot summer days. It is perfect for adventurous people, willing to discover traditional European buildings like this one. To reach the flat there are some very narrow steep stairs, that will definitely pay off once you discover the beautiful views from the terrace.

name: Quiet double room in the citycenter
summary: Welcome to my space!  It is in the very center of Barcelona, possibly the best location in the whole city. You can walk everywhere! The park is just around the corner and the beach is about 15 minutes away. And if you are more of a city visitor type, you can just take a stroll around the crooked little streets in the area. And if it's the nightlife that you crave, you have hundreds of options for bars around the neighborhood.  Hope you enjoy your stay!

Este apartamento con caja fuerte ofrece, 1 comedor con sofá y mesa,  1 dormitorio con cama doble, 1 dormitorio con 2 camas individuales y baño con cabina. La cocina incluye microondas, nevera, tostadora y hervidor eléctrico, y hay zona de estar con sofá, escritorio, TV de pantalla plana, reproductor de DVD y mesa de comedor. Apartamento de 50 m2 con 3 estancias en el 4° piso, luminoso, reformado en  2018, con mobiliario funcional y agradable: salón-comedor con TV y DVD. 1 dorm. con 1 cama de matrimonio. Salida al balcón. 1 dorm. con 2 camas. Salida al balcón. Total acceso a todo el apartamento. La facturación es realizada por el responsable de llaves y tiene que ser realizada no antes las 13:00 y no más tarde de las 21:00. Hay un cargo extra de 30 euros por facturación en horario fuera de horario de 21:00 a 00:00 o de 50 euros de 00:00 a 03:00.

name: Nice apartment near Sagrada Familia  *B*
summary: Come and enjoy this very nice and bright apartment is perfect for families. It's located at only 10 minutes walking from the Sagrada Familia in the modernist "Eixample", one of the most modernized areas in Barcelona.
description: Come and enjoy this very nice and bright apartment is perfect for families. It's located at only 10 minutes walking from the Sagrada Familia in the modernist "Eixample", one of the most modernized areas in Barcelona. The apartment has 2 complete bedrooms with double beds and closets, one bathroom with shower. It also has a living room with TV and an independent dining room. The kitchen is fully equiped. Located in front of the auditorium with many typical restaurants with terraces, it is situated near the important Marina street, which goes directly to the Olympic harbour (20 minutes walk), including its beautiful beaches. It’s is also close to Gran Via street, which goes straight to Plaza Catalunya (20 minutes walk). The apartment faces a quiet and sunny little park.   HUTB-008053 The apartment is fully equipped with: Heating (gas) Kitchen Fridge Oven Toaster Coffee maker Washer Dryer Hairdryer Internet (wifi) TV Cot available on request If you want to rent scooters, electric bicycles

Mi apartamento ofrece una bonita habitación con cama doble, cocina completa y baño de uso compartido. Hay un balcón que da a la calle con mesa y sillas para disfrutar del café de la mañana. name: A Bed in a 6-Bed Mixed Dormitory
summary: Hello! We are Meeting Point Hostels, a modern youth hostel in Barcelona with friendly and international atmosphere. Here you will find all necessary services and facilities to make your stay comfortable.
description: Hello! We are Meeting Point Hostels, a modern youth hostel in Barcelona with friendly and international atmosphere. Here you will find all necessary services and facilities to make your stay comfortable. Our 6 mixed dormitory is a great choice if you are looking to meet other travellers to socialize with. The room has 3 standard bunk beds (190cm long), ensuite bathroom and shower facilities. Each bed has a reading light, a small shelf and a power socket. To keep your personal belongings safe there are individual lockers with keycard locks at your disposal. Bed linen is included in the price and towels can be rented at a surcharge. Hairdryers are available at the front desk upon request. Please note that we do not serve breakfasts. Fully equipped shared kitchen, cosy courtyard, common room (satellite TV, guests computers with internet, foosball, board games, books), self-service laundry (extra fee). Friendly and helpful staff, tourist information, free city maps and useful insider tips

name: Bonito apartamento en el poble sec
summary: Bonito apartamento en el poble sec de Barcelona. Atico con mucha luz y bonito balcón. En una zona muy tranquila y cerca del transporte publico.
description: Bonito apartamento en el poble sec de Barcelona. Atico con mucha luz y bonito balcón. En una zona muy tranquila y cerca del transporte publico. El apartamento está situado en una quinta planta real sin ascensor pero con una escalera ancha y cómoda. El apartamento entero está a vuestra disposición. El poble sec es un barrio muy tradicional y con mucha vida de Barcelona. Cerca del centro, del mar, de montjuich... un lugar perfecto para descansar por la noche y disfrutar de la ciudad de dia! Metro linea 3 Pobla Sec. Please take note of the City Tax to pay in cash in your arrival moment: 2,48€ person and night. I am so sorry but we need to pay to the goverment (This tax is in all the apartments and the hotels). With a maximum charge of 7 nights. Por favor respetad las normas de convivencia de la comunidad.

name: Olympic Apartment
summary: Modern and bright apartment for 4 persons situated in the district of Poblenou.
description: Modern and bright apartment for 4 persons situated in the district of Poblenou. Recently refurbished (2018), the flat has one double bedroom with double bed, a bathroom with shower, a fully equipped American kitchen, a living room with double sofa bed and a little balcony south oriented that gives natural light in the living room all day long. The flat also offers washing machine/dryer, dishwasher, oven/microwaves, air conditioning/heating, Wi-Fi and even a safe box. It is just 2 minutes’ walk from the metro station Bogatell (L4) which links to the city center in 5 minutes. It is also important to notice that the apartment is just 10 minutes’ walk from the beach Nova Icária. Furthermore, you will find around the flat every kind of shops, supermarkets and markets as well as good bars and restaurants. name: Restored Modernist Apartment Adjacent to Las Ramblas
